__e: I know it's regrettable, but I'll be leaving tomorrow evening.
I'd say it's unfortunate, but I'd be lying. Only his mother will miss him.
It's unfortunate you didn't tell us because you would've found out that we thought it's great.
-I am sorry that I never can find a time when we could talk about something different, about you, your life...
I am sorry that this had to happen, because I had started liking you.
Unfortunately for me and for you.
If someone knew where I was, it would be unfortunate-- for both of us.
Then it is a pity for you that you are not the First.
